name: Serious Eats Cleanup 02-23-09
description:
Simplified, removed the background, the huge top graphic,  the huge footer, and all of the ads, and made it cleaner looking. 

Easy to understand, so I'm not going to add any pics, just take a look for yourself.

02-23-09 Widened, brought back some of the misc headers, they link to other yummy food sites...
